wallflower.translation[0].definitions[0]: someone at a party, dance etc who is not asked to dance or take part in the activities
wallflower.translation[0].definitions[1]: a sweet-smelling garden plant with yellow and red flowers
wallflower.translation[1].definitions[0]: an investment that is not popular with investors because it is not profitable enough
Investors started buying the new issue in large numbers, turning a Wall Street wallflower into one of the hottest financial products.
